channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Nitzer Ebb Frontman Douglas McCarthy Dead At 58
item.description: Celebrate the legacy of Nitzer Ebb's frontman Douglas McCarthy 🎶 Let's keep his music alive in our hearts ❤️ #RIPDouglasMcCarthy

item.title: Carnie Wilson Mourns Dad Brian Wilson: ‘I’ve Never Felt This Kind of Pain Before’
item.description: Sending love and strength to Carnie Wilson during this difficult time 💔 Let's all give extra love to our music icons! 🎶 #MusicFamily #SupportOurLegends

item.title: Beach Boys’ Mike Love And Al Jardine Share Eulogies For Brian Wilson
item.description: Sending love and good vibrations as Beach Boys' Mike Love and Al Jardine share touching eulogies for Brian Wilson 🎶💙 #BeachBoys #MusicLegends

item.title: Zach Bryan Reveals Surprise Show at Red Rocks with $50 Tickets
item.description: 🎶 Guess who's shaking up Red Rocks? Zach Bryan! Snag your ticket to this epic surprise show for only $50! 🤘 #ZachBryan #RedRocksSurprise

item.title: Bright Eyes Announce Additional 2025 North American Tour Dates
item.description: 🎉 More @brighteyesband tour dates coming your way in 2025! Who's ready to dance the night away? 💫🎶 #BrightEyesTour2025
